diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $MQ$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $ON$ is $3 + frac{3}{5}$ units.
The length of the line $MN$ is $6$ units.
Point $N$ lies on the line connecting $O$ and $M$.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $P$.
line_instances: There are lines $MN$, $MP$, and $MQ$, forming a triangle $MQP$.
There are lines $ON$, $OM$, $OP$, and $MN$, forming a trapezoid $ONMP$.
